branchCategory.name: HYG
branchCategory.description: Production and packaging applications involving food and beverages often need specialized equipment to meet the strict hygiene standards required in these industry sectors.  SMC, the world leader in pneumatic technology, has developed the HY series to meet these requirements.  All the models in the HY series are particularly suitable for application in the "non-food" or "splash" zones of a production line.  Their high quality construction and optional food grease ensure an increased service life.  The HYG hygienic design guide series is available with a rail mounted auto switch, which is fully adjustable along the stroke length, providing improved cleaning benefits.

branchItem.name: HYG, Hygienic Cylinder with Guide Rods
